law.catch_line: Funds appropriated for legislative sessions -- Payment of compensation of members and employees.
law.text: All funds appropriated for legislative sessions shall be placed in a legislative session fund. All compensation of members and employees and all contingent expenses of the General Assembly shall be paid from this fund on vouchers approved by the co-chairmen of the Legislative Research Commission.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111,sec. 5, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 1, sec. 2.
